title: DO-99-019: Frequently-Asked Questions about Certificates of Divestiture
summary:
OGE provides a summary, in question and answer format, of the rules and policies that apply to certificates of divestiture in most situations.  

Notes: [The information in this Advisory is outdated. For OGE’s more recent Advisory on Certificates of Divestiture, please see DAEOgram DO-06-030.]
